CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 14, 1945, pg. 1 reads: "In Action ! - Pittsburgh joined the parade for democracy this week as colored men began training to become street car and bus operators. PIttsburgh Railways Instructor Edward Golden watches as Dubois H. Carter, 3485 Milwaukee Street, takes over the controls on the practice track at Castle Shannon barn in picture on the left... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Railways instructor Edward Golden, observing Dubois H. Carter training to operate streetcar at Castle Shannon trolley barn
